name: Rhythm Control
summary:
A new music game tailored for the iOS devices, fully utilizing the multi touch screen with simple but addictive gameplay appealing to both newcomers to the genre as well as experienced music game fans.

Rhythm Control contains 13 songs by European and Japanese artists. Some songs are custom made for the game, others are hand picked licensed songs.

Gameplay and difficulty tweaked to make the game enjoyable for both beginners and advanced music game players.

Smooth 60 fps gameplay and retina display support!
info:
• 中文名: 掌控节奏
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: 节奏游戏（Rhythm Game）
  • 发行日期: 2011年1月
  • 售价: 免费
  • 官方网站: http://daikonsoft.com/
  • 开发者: Daikon Media AB
